categories: Category:Hyperspace: The Official Star Wars Fan Club

nodes.text: Galactic Gallery was a feature on Hyperspace: The Official Star Wars Fan Club that showed sketches and renditions from concept artists.
Galactic Gallery began on June 1, 2005 with the image "Danger is Afoot". By August 2, 2006, 169 images were added.

Before our favorite Star Wars icons came to be, they underwent initial explorations in the work of amazing concept artists. These visionaries helped translate George Lucas's imagination into reality. Here is a showcase of their wondrous work.
